definition: A game of chance where participants purchase tickets in the hopes of winning a prize, typically involving a random drawing or selection process. It is commonly used to refer to a form of gambling or a lottery.

examples.german: Ich habe bei der Lotterie gewonnen.
Die Lotterie zieht jeden Samstag die Gewinnzahlen.
examples.english: The lottery draws the winning numbers every Saturday.

examples.german: Er hat sein ganzes Geld für Lotterielose ausgegeben.
examples.english: He spent all his money on lottery tickets.
The lottery offers high chances of winning.
